title: Saudi Arabia Cuts Flagship Oil Price To Lowest In Five Years
description: Saudi Arabia cut the price of its main crude grade to Asia to the lowest level in five years, amid persistent signs of a surplus in global oil markets. State producer Saudi Aramco will reduce the price of its flagship Arab Light crude grade to a 60 cents prem…
content:
